texts.biography: When Lorelei was a child she wandered away from her home, disappearing into a network of caves.  She was found and raised by a harpy hag, and eventually volunteered to serve the Dungeon Overlords shortly before the invasion of Erathia.  She has no memories of her real parents.
texts.name: Lorelei

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Harpies or Harpy Hags for each level attained after 2nd level.
specialty.name: Harpies
